name: google/google-site-kit
description: Site Kit is a one-stop solution for WordPress users to use everything Google has to offer to make them successful on the web.

post-install-cmd: cd includes && echo '{ "autoload": { "classmap": [""] } }' > composer.json && composer dump-autoload --classmap-authoritative --no-interaction && rm composer.json
cd third-party && echo '{ "autoload": { "classmap": [""] } }' > composer.json && composer dump-autoload --classmap-authoritative --no-interaction && rm composer.json
post-update-cmd: cd includes && echo '{ "autoload": { "classmap": [""] } }' > composer.json && composer dump-autoload --classmap-authoritative --no-interaction && rm composer.json
cd third-party && echo '{ "autoload": { "classmap": [""] } }' > composer.json && composer dump-autoload --classmap-authoritative --no-interaction && rm composer.json
